description: Validate the image site registration form elements and submit the form
draftText: Your draft imaging facility registration form will be automatically deleted if there is 8 weeks of inactivity.
successionText: Thank you for your interest in ALZ-NET! We will review your submission and

expectedContent: Thank you for submitting the ALZ-NET Imaging Facility Registration Form. You were automatically assigned the Facility Administrator role in the ALZ-NET Portal for your facility.

registrationFormText.thankYouText: Thank you for your interest in becoming a participating imaging facility of the Alzheimerâ€™s Network for Treatment and Diagnostics (ALZ-NET).
registrationFormText.pleaseNoteText: Please note: Do not complete the form more than once for the same imaging facility location. If any information has changed since the original submission of your facility's Registration Form or if you are unsure if your site has already been submitted, please contact alznet-imaging@acr.org.
registrationFormText.instructionsText: Instructions: After reviewing the ALZ-NET protocol synopsis,, please complete the feasibility and registration questionnaire below. The 10-minute questionnaire will collect comprehensive information about your facility. After submission of the questionnaire, the ALZ-NET Operations Team will review all responses in a timely manner. If your imaging facility is approved to participate, you will be provided with an electronic welcome packet that contains all essential documents and further instructions on next steps and the start-up process.
